Review.Titre: To summarize, QR code kits can be a great way to engage customers and increase brand awareness.
Review.Contenu: In summary, here are some suggestions for how the company can improve its QR code kit:- Make sure the user experience is seamless and easy to use.- Test the QR code kit to make sure it works properly.- Provide clear instructions and guidance on how to use the QR code kit.- Offer customer support in case users encounter any issues.Is that more clear? I hope this helps!

Review.Titre: contact me via phone for more info

Review.Contenu: Is a misleading advertisement: it says that you can make a free trial by having ONE free QR code (and it is not specified that it has limited value in time) implying that the first QR code is free and, if you like the system, you can sign up, pay and make other QR codes. So it becomes a blackmail, because we created a QR code printed on dozens of copies of a product, considering to create latelay more codes for a fee, but after 2 weeks we got the blackmail of having to pay a QR code that should have been free, and they canceled it, so now that QR code doesn’t lead to the desired page, creating a big problem to the company, as if he had put in the cellar and tied up his own friend. It's ridiculous to consider the "test" for a site that creates QR code as "a trial period of ONE code" (besides on the site is not clarified in this sense), if it had been immediately and directly communicated a "paid version" we would have used it, but at that moment, looking for a site togenerate a QR code before sending the file to the print shop we used this site, considering to sign up later, waiting to get if it was a half-scam or not, and in fact we did well not to subscribe and not use a paid version because it is tremendously not serious to attract users with this "trick". So, we decided to replace it with stickers doing it with another site that REALLY offers a free QR code (forever working) and then we will pay other products by subscribing. In so much competition it is really foolish to create such a phishing and blackmail people afterwards.

I was mislead and now I have to purchase a plan every month. Before creating a code there is no information that you are creating a dynamic code. In order to use it later, you have to have a plan. Only static codes are for free but you don't get any information about that. So be careful before using.I was offered to create a new code and a refund of the first payment I had to make. But since I need to use the code for at least a year from now so none of the options fits. And now I will have to pay only because they mislead new clients. And their promise of trying to make the changes doesn't make my situation solved...

Clearly they are not available to answer to the customer. They are asking me now, that I rated 2 stars if  I had a problem but before they did not answer my contact. The problem is that I am not even now able to write to them because here re-answering is not permitted.2nd Message: Ok Diego, may be it is a misunderstood. I have not received any answer from you. I wil check my Credit Card account if there is any probem I'll contact you. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Be sure you want to subscribe before you try out
Review.Contenu: I didn't find it that easy to apply the codes to a page I was going to print but it might have got easier with practice. I did not want it for business I wanted it for voluntary work.  The product is fine but I had not understood at the outset that with this company the codes used in the trial period would be deactivated and no longer work if I did not subscribe at the end of the trial period.  I do think that it should be absolutely clear that the codes created in the trial period will expire once the 2 weeks have expired and a warning ought to be given clearly that it is not advisable to use the trial codes in any permanent paperwork - in my case I also put the website on which was just as well.  Obviously at the outset you just don't know if you want to pay for a subscription and after a week I found it too fiddly.  No doubt the warning was there somewhere in the microscopic small print Ts and Cs; that any codes created would not last beyond the 2 weeks but it was not apparent to me when I went through the process.  So I feel like I wasted my time with it.

Review.Titre: Sometimes the pojects page gets crazy
Review.Contenu: Sometimes the pojects page gets crazy, Simply It wasn't let me in. the page didn't discharge at 100%, it seems like it can't enter complety. I tried several times Until the page entered. Last time was today, could you check this issue please? Thanks!

I sent a chat in with a problem I was having. The chat mentioned they respond in about 20 minutes which was not the case. It happened to be 2:00am when i received a response. I missed it but Luli Ini followed up via email. They were able to solve my problem quickly and efficiently.

Review.Titre: It was quickly en very nice :)

Review.Contenu: an ideal collaborator, very simple and intuitive

Review.Titre: System works well no problems until cancelation
Review.Contenu: System works well no problems, only issue is with the auto subscription, would have like some notification before renewal to enable a cancelation request to be submitted.

Review.Titre: A couple of challenges getting it to work initially
Review.Contenu: A couple of glitches that meant certain formats wouldn't work for me  on these dynamic QR. However the chat team sorted out my main problem. The QR codes are really easy to modify too, and change the destination video, which was really important to me

Review.Titre: Helpful and easy to increase QR code package via email
Review.Contenu: Lucas was very helpful

Luli was very helpful and the problem is nowe fixed, however, I was first told that the problem was occurring on the domain side - which I have been told before and tried to fix, but then all of the sudden (once uQR started looking into it) it was fixed.

Review.Titre: I appreciate getting service via chat
Review.Contenu: I appreciate getting service via chat. I found it weird that the agent was reluctant to confirm they helped Me until I left a review. That sounds like holding costumers hostage to a review.

Review.Titre: My experience with Luli was great AFTER…
Review.Contenu: My experience with Luli was great AFTER we started communicating by email.  The chat only option for customer service stinks.  The delays in conversation are annoying and it takes much longer to resolve issues.

Review.Titre: More customisation & flexibilities on the QR code & landing page design
Review.Contenu: uQR is so far a better than average QR code service provider. The support team are prompt to respond to my query. Of course there's still room to improve in terms of a more friendly user experience for both UX & UI, expand more customisation and flexibilities on the QR code design & landing page design. Looking forward to those additional feature. TQ!

Review.Titre: Very easy to set up and use
Review.Contenu: Very easy to set up and use. Good reporting back. We liked the opportunity to have a few different codes for the one project so we could track where people were seeing the promos.
I appreciate the quick action. I would however be good to have an EFT option available so we can ensure renewals can be processed through our accounts payable processes.

Review.Titre: Good product and does what it says
Review.Contenu: Good product and does what it says to do.Support is responsive.Back end is ok'ish. Nothing amazing but also not bad.This worked good for us in using mobile menu's in Covid times.

Review.Titre: Well is the first time we choose QR.me
Review.Contenu: Well is the first time we choose QR.me, but the service was very good, the info in the webpage is very clear and is simple to use.

Review.Contenu: I think that the price is high compared to the use that I’ll give

Review.Titre: Great customer service and really useful platform
Review.Contenu: We've been using UQR for a couple of years and have found it a really helpful platform to keep track of our QR codes and monitor performance. Would recommend to anyone looking for a platform and the customer service has always been fantastic, the team are happy to help and answer any questions you may have to help you get the most out of UQR!

Excellent costumer service!Hardworking people that truly solve your problems, while being lovely at the same time. 5 stars to the person that served me, Milena.More than satisfied with the QR and the people that keep it running.Thank You.

Lucas was fantastic at helping solving a very specific glitch issue that happened with when uploading an updated PDF to my menu format QR Code. We spoke and worked over the course of 3 days to solve the issue. He was timely in his responses and very helpful.

I was used to logging in using a username and password, and today, after about two years of not logging in to my account, I found out that they changed the login methods to email and password. And I had no idea which of my emails I used to sign up. I sent a message in the help center and a representative named Franco helped me locate my email within 2 minutes. Thank you very much for a quick and professional response 🥰
Paula was very helpful. Checked on everything I wondered about, even generating a sample of the stats report. She also searched up the discount link for nonprofits which I so appreciated.

Review.Titre: Lucas Helped me troubleshoot where my…
Review.Contenu: Lucas Helped me troubleshoot where my QR code was and how to see the statistics. I had two accounts, one from work and one from personal. I used the personal account as a test site to see how the public received the mailing I sent over the holidays. Thus out of 300 sent, six responded and interacted with the QR code.Thank you, Lucas, for taking the next step to help.

Brilliant service, allows you to keep the same QR code but change the forwarding URL perfect for things like Newsletters (this is what we use it for in our school, we have one QR code and the newsletter changes each week). Their customer service is second to none and i would highly recommend them. We are a school in the NW of England, UK.

Lucas was attentive and very patient/professional in his responses to my very ignorant questions.  I appreciated this as I am a "5" on the "being adept at technology scale" (1-10).  My question was answered and he then added additional resources for me so that I could be successful with the task in front of me. Lucas was definitely knowledgeable. I can see that he is a valuable asset to your team.  Thank You!!
I messaged with a query about account ownership... within 2min a lovely, friendly woman called Donna replied. Gave me all the info I required in a quick timely fashion and made my morning!

Review.Titre: I used the chat function for a question…
Review.Contenu: I used the chat function for a question about how to navigate around the UQR.me website. Milena was very helpful: Concise with her information, quick to respond and approachable in her tone. A professional.

Review.Titre: Customer support as it should always be
Review.Contenu: Donna, the person who helped me out with my issue, she has been very kind and precise. She solved my problem and kept me updated throughout all the customer support path! Thanks.

Review.Titre: Easy to use QR cod generator
Review.Contenu: Easy to use QR cod generator with link and social media support. Great way to manage points of contact and track campaigns. Customer service was prompt with resolving a billing issue.

She was able to give me a solution to my problem, she didn't just answer me, she investigated the possible origin of the fault, she fixed it and taught me not to make mistakes on subsequent occasions, all with patience and a lot of empathy. Thank you very much.

Review.Titre: Issue quickly resolved, give Paula a raise!
Review.Contenu: Paula was knowledgable, very helpful, and on top of the situation. She quickly resolved my issue. I think the auto-message that a reply is typically quickly made within minutes could be updated, as it took about 30 or so minutes to talk to someone, but that's pretty nitpicky. I'm happy my issue was resolved and resolved quickly.

Review.Titre: uQR is a great platform for creating…
Review.Contenu: uQR is a great platform for creating and managing QR codes for organisations. It's very easy to use and user friendly. It has helped us digitise our restaurant menu during covid and increased our customer satisfaction and our review score.

Review.Titre: Best QR Code generators [2022] The only…is best
Review.Contenu: Best QR Code generators [2022] The only list you’ll ever need!A detailed comparison of QR Code generators (yes, I tested all of them).Best QR Code generator: Choose the right oneYour QR Code is a marketing channel. Pick a QR solution, not just a generator.QR Codes have been around for two decades, but they never became mainstream. 2020–21 changed that. As the pandemic hit in 2020, QR Codes took the center stage. Brand owners and marketers felt inclined to use QR Codes as a contactless solution driver. From adding them on product packaging to replacing physical menus with QR Codes, these scan codes are everywhere. What started as a contactless way to deliver information, evolved into a direct-to-consumer communication channel for most brands.But QR Codes are often associated with security threats. To help you choose the safest and best QR Code generator for your use case, I tested and put together a comprehensive comparison sheet.

I'm new to QR codes (not using them, but having our own for a new business). This is the ONLY company I found that has good reviews. I needed help choosing a plan and I was able to connect with a real person via live chat in less than a minute. Luli was super-helpful and very knowledgeable.
Really good service, super easy and intuitive website to generate and mofied your QRs, great response team to any doubt or problem you have. 10/10

Paula gave me quick response with the answer I needed about roles.  I also shared that I couldn't find "roles" on the support page and she told me to search for  "user management".  It might nice if "roles" was a searchable word.    Again, Paula, was quick and efficient.   Thanks!
Paula Pepe was AMAZING. She answered ALL My questions and provided me backup resources to check and she also was very kind and quick to respond. She is a customer service superstar!!!
